title: BWW Apps - Home
registerTxt: If you have registered with this site please login for the optimal experience
ifNotRegistered: If you haven't registered please do so.
clickAndRegister: Click here to register an account.
fitAppsDesc: If you enjoy physical fitness activities as much as I do then you may find any or all of my fitness apps useful. The Spartacus Workout is a great workout for burning fat and getting cut. The Run Speed Calculator can help you determine the pace you need to maintain to meet your long-distance running goals. The Fitness Calculator can help you calculate your body fat percentage and BMI. Last but not least, the pyramid workout is a great strength training alternative to the popular 5x5 routine.
utilityAppsDesc: These apps are meant to help you get things done, and enjoy a better quality of life. The photo viewer is a simple photo gallery which allows you to upload and view your photos. The To Do List and Shopping List apps do exactly what you would infer by their respective names.
triflingAppsDesc: These apps are of little real-world value. I only wrote them as a means to practice my coding skills. However, the Horoscope Generator may provide some entertainment value if you are looking for a laugh.
